item.description:
Welcome to the Monday Happy Hour series!

This event is open to all, especially those who hate Mondays and especially for those who want to check out the events and restaurant scenes in Providence.

This week's location is: India! Located at the end of Blackstone Boulevard on the East Side on the edge of Lippitt Park.


India is an East Side FAVORITE and offers an exotic and inviting atmosphere, plus free henna tattoos and belly dancing on the weekends! Weather permitting we'll be outside in their beautiful back garden patio where you can sip cocktails in swinging chairs, listen to the babble of the garden fountain, enjoy the outdoor breezes and sample their delicious cuisine. THIS one is not to miss! The India management has always been extremely generous with the Collective and will be offering free appetizers just for us!  I also hear there might be a belly dancer......

So really, do you need another reason? Let's check it out!

www.indiarestaurant.com.

Hope to see you there!

Come early, come late, leave early, stay late, everyone is always welcome... Nothing ever cancels Monday Happy Hours. Ever.
item.how_to_find_us: I'll be wearing a bright blue, gradated-dyed scarf, but we're hard ot miss!
item.name: Monday Night Meetup - India!
